title: WorldWatch Watch Face
summary: Wear the day and night sides of the earth on your wrist
developerAddress:
RunaR
van Brederodestraat 11
2811 XG Reeuwijk
The Netherlands
description: This Android Wear watch face will show the day and night side of the earth. In the night area you can see the city lights shine.The maps are based on the blue marble and black marble maps from NASA.The time digits are animated. You can read the time after the digits swarm into place.Also try our StarWatch watch face for Wear!
descriptionHTML:
This Android Wear watch face will show the day and night side of the earth. In the night area you can see the city lights shine.

The maps are based on the blue marble and black marble maps from NASA.

The time digits are animated. You can read the time after the digits swarm into place.

Also try our StarWatch watch face for Wear!
comments: Love this watchface. It's pretty awesome, I especially like the transition of the numbers when notification pop-ups / when I close app. Only downside is that I am missing the month number there. But it isn't needed that much so I am giving the 5 stars.
Nice. Needs option to disable background for OLED devices.
What th ??? Bought, installed, where it's it?? Can't find it....What happen. Refund, tell me where I went wrong. I'll try it again
recentChanges: Added support for higher resolution watches.
